experience.description: My first app was a Flappy Bird clone from a YT video. I fell in love with coding and published 5 apps to the AppStore that year.
I built a creative Swift Playground to help prevent suicides in my community which then lead to Apple awarding me a Scholarship.
As a Android Engineer at YouVersion we help people around the world engage with Godâ€™s Word by developing, refining, and growing the YouVersion Bible App mobile experience on Android devices.
At AOGE we made oil and gas investing easy and accessable for everyone regardless of their background. (We unfortunatly ran out of funding and had to shut down)
